Text: Odd. +32 quality and a -1 and not one single comment.
I do appreciate feedback by the way.

What I would like to know by using the .exe file instead of the java launchers like others have is how do I play with a name?

I had downloaded one like this that uses the .exe filed and logged on to my server but my name is just Player. In the other ones you put your name in the java launcher and bam there u go.
Start the game by using the hacked laucher, type a name in the box, and then start the game. It should be good. Make sure you are using the name spoofer and not the normal launcher.
No sir, I coded it myself so I know it is clean.
